welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glen Allen, where southern hospitality meets charming small-town vibes. Known for its beautiful parks and historic sites, we invite you to soak up the city's charm and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richmond International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is used for domestic flights operated by Delta and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is used for domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue, Southwest, and other airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'RIC Free WiFi' and following the instructions.
